Hi Erika,

 

Can you review this and then arrange the signatures.  

 

Neeku/Michelle can help with the shareholder information for this form, and it will also need the green light from legal (as per policy, they must review everything prior to signature)

 

Copying @Hagop Ghazarian <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>  from our insurance team because he will need the details of the coverage for future reference.

 

Thank you

Dear James,

 

I hope you're well.

 

To finalize the paperwork process with Allianz Trade so you can benefit from our insurance, you'll find attached two documents to be filled in and returned to us. In addition, we'll also need a company registration certificate of less than 3 months.

 

Have a nice day.

 

Regards.
